description:
At Tres LA Group, we pride ourselves on creating unforgettable, elegant events that showcase our exceptional culinary expertise and unparalleled level of service. As a Southern California-based company, we have been recognized multiple times as the top caterer in Los Angeles. Our commitment to excellence and attention to detail have earned us a stellar reputation in the industry.We are now seeking a talented Production Assistant who shares our passion and dedication to join our exceptional team.

Essential Responsibilities:

  • Initiate regular status updates with the supervisor; prioritize and maintain an ongoing task list to ensure all deadlines are met promptly
  • Provide day-to-day support for the production and sales team during various stages of development, preparation, and production
  • Maintain and update several Tripleseat/RESERVE tracking databases used daily by the department
  • Print updated BEOs for Kitchen Teams and production meetings
  • Support the creative team by cataloging photo and video content for social media posts
  • Assist the supervisor with preparation for weekly offsite/onsite tastings, events, and delivery services. Tasks may include ordering, returning, moving/packing items, obtaining information for deliveries, and running errands as needed
  • Fulfill specific daily requirements, such as replenishing paper trays in the copier, straightening conference rooms between meetings and at the end of the day, and ordering office supplies
  • Manage expense and mileage reports, reconcile credit card statements, and submit expenses regularly
  • Serve as an occasional backup for the office assistant
  • Perform miscellaneous tasks as needed

Basic Qualifications:

  • Previous Event Productionexperience required
  • Previous experience in kitchen back-of-house is preferred
  • Previous experience with rental orders in FOH and BOH is required
  • Strong time management skills and the ability to prioritize while meeting strict deadlines
  • Detail-oriented with the ability to multitask efficiently while maintaining professionalism under pressure
  • Maintain a high level of confidentiality with client information, billing, and agreements
  • Willingness to work overtime and occasionally on weekends with short notice
  • Safe driver with the knowledge to quickly navigate the city
  • Positive attitude, motivated, and eager to learn
  • Background check required

Compensation:

  • $30- $35hourly DOE

We are looking for a dynamic and dedicated Production Assistant to join our team. If you are organized, detail-oriented, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you!
